verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"This is the <S%H2708>statute<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> <S%H559><s%> <S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> you a <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H6510>heifer<s%> without <S%H8549>spot,<s%> in which is no <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> and which was <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5923>yoked.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>give<s%> her to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and he shall bring her <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and one shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> her before his <S%H6440>face:<s%>

and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood<s%> with his <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> her <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5227>toward<s%> the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%>

One shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> the <S%H6510>heifer<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight;<s%> her <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and her <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and her <S%H1818>blood,<s%> with her <S%H6569>dung,<s%> shall he <S%H8313>burn:<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and <S%H8438>scarlet,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H8316>burning<s%> of the <S%H6510>heifer.<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

He who <S%H8313>burns<s%> her shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

"A <S%H376>man<s%> who is <S%H2889>clean<s%> shall <S%H622>gather<s%> up the <S%H665>ashes<s%> of the <S%H6510>heifer,<s%> and lay them <S%H3240>up<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> and it shall be <S%H4931>kept<s%> for the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for a <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity:<s%> it is a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

He who <S%H622>gathers<s%> the <S%H665>ashes<s%> of the <S%H6510>heifer<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening:<s%> and it shall be to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and to the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> who lives as a <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H2708>them,<s%> for a statute <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
"He who <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body<s%> of any <S%H120>man<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%>

the same shall <S%H2398>purify<s%> himself with water on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall be <S%H2891>clean:<s%> but if he <S%H2398>doesn't<s%> purify himself the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> then the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall not be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

Whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>person,<s%> the body of a <S%H120>man<s%> who has <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H2398>doesn't<s%> purify <S%H2930>himself,<s%> defiles the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> because the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%> was not <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> on <S%H2931>him,<s%> he shall be unclean; his uncleanness is yet on <S%H2932>him.<s%>

"This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> when a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> in a <S%H168>tent:<s%> everyone who <S%H935>comes<s%> into the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and everyone who is in the <S%H168>tent,<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
Every <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> which has no <S%H6781>covering<s%> <S%H6616>bound<s%> on <S%H2931>it,<s%> is unclean.

"Whoever in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> one who is <S%H2491>slain<s%> with a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> or a dead <S%H4191>body,<s%> or a <S%H6106>bone<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> or a <S%H6913>grave,<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

"For the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H6083>ashes<s%> of the <S%H8316>burning<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H2416>offering;<s%> and running <S%H4325>water<s%> shall be <S%H5414>put<s%> thereto in a <S%H3627>vessel:<s%>

and a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H376>person<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and <S%H2881>dip<s%> it in the <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it on the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and on all the <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and on the <S%H5315>persons<s%> who were <S%H5060>there,<s%> and on him who touched the <S%H6106>bone,<s%> or the <S%H2491>slain,<s%> or the <S%H4191>dead,<s%> or the <S%H6913>grave:<s%>

and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> person shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> on the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H2398>purify<s%> <S%H3526>him;<s%> and he shall wash his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3526>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%> at <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

But the <S%H376>man<s%> who shall be <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> and shall not <S%H2398>purify<s%> <S%H5315>himself,<s%> that soul shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> because he has <S%H2930>defiled<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%> has not been <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> on <S%H2931>him;<s%> he is unclean.

It shall be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> to <S%H5137>them:<s%> and he who sprinkles the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and he who <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

"Whatever the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> person <S%H5060>touches<s%> shall be <S%H2931>unclean;<s%> and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H5060>touches<s%> it shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until <S%H6153>evening.<s%>"
